note: Craig Gore was born in South Carolina and brought up in North Carolina. After moving to Chicago, he graduated from Columbia College Chicago in fiction/creative writing. After completing his bachelor’s degree, Gore moved to LA and started writing pilots and features, and optioning books. He began his career by selling the pilot of “Stray Bullets” in 2008 to Fox TV Studios. Craig's was unstoppable after that.
